Player One\'s turn!

There will be 4 questions per quiz. If you guess correctly, you will earn one point. If you guess incorrectly you will lose one point. You can only skip once per quiz, and will earn zero points. You can only cheat once per quiz, and will also earn zero points. If you would like to continue taking quizzes, just press the "Next quiz" button. If not, you can simply exit the app.
True
If you are with a buddy and want to see who knows London better, have them play this round and see who can score higher!

It is illegal to die in the Palace of Westminster.
Big Ben\'s chime is in the key of C.
More than half of the London Underground network runs below ground.
Only two Tube stations have all five vowels in their name: South Ealing and Mansion House.
Big Ben is the bell, not the clock tower.
The tallest building in London is The Shard London Bridge.
The Shard London Bridge is 300 m tall.
The Queen needs permission to enter the City of London.
The Houses of Parliament has 6 bars within it.
To become a black cab driver, you have to memorize every street.
The Millennium Dome is smaller than the Great Pyriamids of Giza.
London has a little less than 170 museums.
Aldgate station has 1000 bodies buried beneath it.
London has the 2nd most languages spoken.
There are more American Banks in London than in NY.
One in three Londoners are foreign born.
